# model

**Instance Property**

The model to base the image analysis request on.

## Declaration

```swift
var model: VNCoreMLModel { get }
```

## Discussion

This object wraps a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreML] model.

## Initializing with a Core ML Model

- **init(model:)**: Creates a model container to use with an image analysis request based on the model you provide.
- **init(model:completionHandler:)**: Creates a model container to use with an image analysis request based on the model you provide, with an optional completion handler.
- **VNCoreMLModel**: A container for the model to use with Vision requests.
